description: Contact management in PFC - handles interactions between balls, pebbles, and facets

functions.name: count
functions.signature: itasca.contact.count(process: str = 'mechanical', type: TypeObject = None, all: bool = False) -> int
functions.description: Get the number of contacts. All arguments are optional. If type is specified, count is limited to that contact type (e.g., itasca.BallBallContact). If all=True, virtual contacts are included.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Python type object to filter contacts (e.g., itasca.BallBallContact, itasca.BallFacetContact)

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: If True, include virtual contacts (default: False)

returns.description: Number of contacts matching the criteria

functions.name: energy
functions.signature: itasca.contact.energy(energy_name: str, process: str = 'mechanical', type: TypeObject = None) -> float
functions.description: Get energy values accumulated over contacts. Can filter by process and contact type.

parameters.name: energy_name
parameters.description: Name of energy quantity to query

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Python contact type object to filter

returns.description: Total energy value for specified contacts

functions.name: find
functions.signature: itasca.contact.find(type: TypeObject, id: int or tuple) -> Contact
functions.description: Get the contact of the given type. The id can be either an integer ID or a tuple containing two objects (e.g., (wall_object, ball_object)).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Contact ID (int) or tuple of two objects (object1, object2)

returns.description: Contact object if found, None otherwise

functions.name: list
functions.signature: itasca.contact.list(process_name: str = 'Mechanical', type: TypeObject = None, all: bool = False) -> Contact iterator
functions.description: Get a contact iterator object. Returns iterator (not list). If type is specified, only contacts of that type are returned. If all=True, virtual contacts are included.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Python contact type object to filter (e.g., itasca.BallBallContact, itasca.BallFacetContact, itasca.BallPebbleContact, itasca.PebblePebbleContact, itasca.PebbleFacetContact)

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: If True, include virtual contacts (default: False)

functions.name: model_prop_index
functions.description: Get a contact model property index. Used for efficient property access in contact models.
